text:
@narendramodi Have you ever noticed hundreds of bankers dying every year due to #depression caused by immense work pressure and harassment by bank management?
More than 30 bankers have died due to #coronavirus unofficially and hundreds are infected.
Please act humanely.
#RIPShushant
